question: Which country has unanimously amended its National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA), to condemn Chinese aggression?
explanation:
The House of Representatives of the United States has unanimously passed an amendment to the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA), condemning China's aggression.
Chinaâ€™s military activities against India in the Galwan Valley, its growing territorial actions around disputed areas like the South China Sea are condemned. The United States also added 11 Chinese companies to economic blacklist over its treatment of Uighurs in Xinjiang.
